name: Minecraft: Story Mode - Episode 4: A Block and a Hard Place
name_original: Minecraft: Story Mode - Episode 4: A Block and a Hard Place
description:
Minecraft: Story Mode - Episode 4: A Block and a Hard Place is an adventure game developed by Telltale Games and Mojang. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by Telltale Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Minecraft: Story Mode - Episode 4: A Block and a Hard Place on PC and PlayStation 3.
